page.title: 12Elton Women's Institute
page.content: Elton W.I. meets in the Village Hall on the second Thursday of each month. 1986 is the thirty-third anniversary. There are thirty-six members with ages ranging from 24 to 84 years. Each year the Committee arranges a varied programme and this year there will be speakers on topics as diverse as wine-making, homeopathic medicine, antiques and cactus growing. Elton W.I. has always played a significant part in the life of the village and members run monthly whist- drives, organise keep-fit classes and raise money for causes both within and without the village. In March 1985 eight members formed the Eltonian Club for the Senior Citizens, but for many years an annual tea and outing has been arranged for them. Shortly before Christmas members alw- ays carol-sing around the village.
